name: Bubbles 'n Blood
description:
In Bubbles 'n Blood you play as an unfortunate dude who is trying to escape from a monster infested house. Can you finish all 8 rooms and beat the boss?  The game combines violent gory action with cute bubble popping as "incompatible genres" for the Ludum Dare 41 Game Jam.

CONTROLS:

Mouse Click Left: Move/ Pop Bubbles
Mouse Click Right : Shoot enemies and walls

OBJECTIVE:

Get key and open door to move to next room. Avoid or kill enemies. 
Beware of final boss!
